introduction.paragraph: To build Sync Gateway from source, you must have Go 1.2 or later installed on your computer.
On Mac or Unix systems, you can build Sync Gateway from source as follows:

list-item.paragraph: Open a terminal window and change to the directory that you want to store Sync Gateway in.
Clone the Sync Gateway GitHub repository:

list-item.code-block: $ git submodule init $ git submodule update

introduction.paragraph: Sync Gateway is a standalone, native executable located in the ./bin directory. You can run the executable from the build location or move it anywhere you want.
To update your build later, pull the latest updates from GitHub, update the submodules, and run ./build.sh again.
